short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save ASAP with AI. Save more, categorize & analyze as you browse to Airtable and elsewhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀
-  Extract and save data to a destination of your choice: Airtable, Calendar, Email or any Webhook URL
- Use AI to extract and categorize information for you, no matter where you save
- Update matching records as you browse the web
- Create new Airtable tables in seconds with AI assistance
- Quickly narrow down a portion of the screen for more precise extraction
- Autofill URLs, images, headers, descriptions, and more
- Take screenshots
- Run autofills quickly with keyboard shortcuts

𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗰𝗮𝘀𝗲𝘀
⚡ Save websites - portfolios, competitors, any other websites
⚡ Content management - quickly add new content and update existing content. Manage Airtable content for Softr, Glide and other websites using Airtable as backend
⚡ CRM upgrade - make your Airtable CRM more integrated, update contacts and organization as you visit their websites or social media profiles or as you're messaging with them on different platforms
⚡ Content auditing - review content under different URLs and save notes
⚡ Social media - save information about followers, posts
⚡ Products - save products of any kind and categorize it to Airtable
⚡ Migrations - transfer content from legacy websites and migrate to new structures
⚡ Quickly add any Airtable record right from the browser
⚡ Trigger workflows in Zapier, Make, Pipedream, Relay and others
